content: This is a **list of [butterflies](/wiki/Butterflies) of [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore)**. About 305 species are known from Singapore. ## Papilionidae ### Papilioninae - *[Chilasa clytia clytia](/wiki/Chilasa_clytia)* – common mime - *[Graphium agamemnon agamemnon](/wiki/Graphium_agamemnon)* – tailed jay - *[Graphium doson evemonides](/wiki/Graphium_doson)* – common jay - *[Graphium evemon eventus](/wiki/Graphium_evemon)* – blue jay - *[Graphium sarpedon luctatius](/wiki/Graphium_sarpedon)* – common bluebottle - *[Pachliopta aristolochiae asteris](/wiki/Pachliopta_aristolochiae)* – common rose - *[Papilio demoleus malayanus](/wiki/Papilio_demoleus)* – lime butterfly - *[Papilio demolion demolion](/wiki/Papilio_demolion)* – banded swallowtail - *[Papilio iswara iswara](/wiki/Papilio_iswara)* – great Helen - *[Papilio memnon agenor](/wiki/Papilio_memnon)* – great Mormon - *[Papilio polytes romulus](/wiki/Papilio_polytes)* – common Mormon - *[Papilio prexaspes prexaspes](/wiki/Papilio_prexaspes)* – blue Helen - *[Pathysa antiphates itamputi](/wiki/Pathysa_antiphates)* – five bar swordtail - *[Troides amphrysus ruficollis](/wiki/Troides_amphrysus)* – Malayan birdwing - *[Troides helena cerberus](/wiki/Troides_helena)* – common birdwing ## Pieridae ### Coliadinae - *[Catopsilia pomona pomona](/wiki/Catopsilia_pomona)* – lemon emigrant - *[Catopsilia pyranthe pyranthe](/wiki/Catopsilia_pyranthe)* – mottled emigrant - *[Catopsilia scylla cornelia](/wiki/Catopsilia_scylla)* – orange emigrant - *[Eurema andersonii andersonii](/wiki/Eurema_andersonii)* – Anderson's grass yellow - *[Eurema blanda snelleni](/wiki/Eurema_blanda)* – three spot grass yellow - *[Eurema brigitta senna](/wiki/Eurema_brigitta)* – no brand grass yellow - *[Eurema hecabe contubernalis](/wiki/Eurema_hecabe)* – common grass yellow - *[Eurema sari sodalis](/wiki/Eurema_sari)* – chocolate grass yellow - *[Eurema simulatrix tecmessa](/wiki/Eurema_simulatrix)* - *[Gandaca harina distanti](/wiki/Gandaca_harina)* – tree yellow ### Pierinae - *[Appias indra plana](/wiki/Appias_indra)* – plain puffin - *[Appias libythea olferna](/wiki/Appias_libythea)* – striped albatross - *[Appias lyncida vasava](/wiki/Appias_lyncida)* – chocolate albatross - *[Delias hyparete metarete](/wiki/Delias_hyparete)* – painted Jezebel - *[Delias pasithoe parthenope](/wiki/Delias_pasithoe)* – red base Jezebel - *[Hebomoia glaucippe aturia](/wiki/Hebomoia_glaucippe)* – great orange tip - *[Leptosia nina malayana](/wiki/Leptosia_nina)* – Psyche - *[Pareronia valeria lutescens](/wiki/Pareronia_valeria)* – wanderer - *[Pieris canidia canidia](/wiki/Pieris_canidia)* – cabbage white ## Nymphalidae ### Danainae - *[Danaus chrysippus chrysippus](/wiki/Danaus_chrysippus)* – plain tiger - *[Danaus genutia genutia](/wiki/Danaus_genutia)* – common tiger - *[Danaus melanippus hegesippus](/wiki/Danaus_melanippus)* – black veined tiger - *[Euploea camaralzeman malayica](/wiki/Euploea_camaralzeman)* – Malayan crow - *[Euploea crameri bremeri](/wiki/Euploea_crameri)* – spotted black crow - *[Euploea eyndhovii gardineri](/wiki/Euploea_eyndhovii)* – striped black crow - *[Euploea midamus singapura](/wiki/Euploea_midamus)* – blue spotted crow - *[Euploea mulciber mulciber](/wiki/Euploea_mulciber)* – striped blue crow - *[Euploea phaenareta castelnaui](/wiki/Euploea_phaenareta)* – king crow - *[Euploea radamanthus radamanthus](/wiki/Euploea_radamanthus)* – magpie crow - *[Euploea tulliolus ledereri](/wiki/Euploea_tulliolus)* – dwarf crow - *[Idea leuconoe chersonesia](/wiki/Idea_leuconoe)* – mangrove tree nymph - *[Idea stolli logani](/wiki/Idea_stolli)* – common tree nymph - *[Ideopsis vulgaris macrina](/wiki/Ideopsis_vulgaris)* – blue glassy tiger - *[Parantica agleoides agleoides](/wiki/Parantica_agleoides)* – dark glassy tiger - *[Parantica aspasia aspasia](/wiki/Parantica_aspasia)* – yellow glassy tiger ### Satyrinae - *[Elymnias hypermnestra agina](/wiki/Elymnias_hypermnestra)* – common palmfly - *[Elymnias panthera panthera](/wiki/Elymnias_panthera)* – tawny palmfly - *[Elymnias penanga penanga](/wiki/Elymnias_penanga)* – pointed palmfly - *[Lethe europa malaya](/wiki/Lethe_europa)* – bamboo tree brown - *[Melanitis leda leda](/wiki/Melanitis_leda)* – common evening brown - *[Mycalesis fusca fusca](/wiki/Mycalesis_fusca)* – Malayan bush brown - *[Mycalesis mineus macromalayana](/wiki/Mycalesis_mineus)* – dark brand bush brown - *[Mycalesis orseis nautilus](/wiki/Mycalesis_orseis)* – purple bush brown - *[Mycalesis perseoides perseoides](/wiki/Mycalesis_perseoides)* - *[Mycalesis perseus cepheus](/wiki/Mycalesis_perseus)* – dingy bush brown - *[Mycalesis visala phamis](/wiki/Mycalesis_visala)* – long branded bush brown - *[Orsotriaena medus cinerea](/wiki/Orsotriaena_medus)* – nigger - *[Ypthima baldus newboldi](/wiki/Ypthima_baldus)* – common five ring - *Ypthima fasciata torone* - *Ypthima horsfieldii humei* - Malayan five ring - *[Ypthima huebneri](/wiki/Ypthima_huebneri)* – common four ring - *Ypthima pandocus corticaria* – common three ring ### Morphinae - *[Amathusia phidippus phidippus](/wiki/Amathusia_phidippus)* – palm king - *[Discophora sondaica despoliata](/wiki/Discophora_sondaica)* – common duffer - *[Faunis canens arcesilas](/wiki/Faunis_canens)* – common faun - *[Thaumantis klugius lucipor](/wiki/Thaumantis_klugius)* – dark blue jungle glory - *[Zeuxidia amethystus amethystus](/wiki/Zeuxidia_amethystus)* – Saturn ### Nymphalinae - *[Doleschallia bisaltide ?bisalitide](/wiki/Doleschallia_bisaltide)* var. – autumn leaf - *[Doleschallia bisaltide pratipa](/wiki/Doleschallia_bisaltide)* – autumn leaf - *[Hypolimnas anomala anomala](/wiki/Hypolimnas_anomala)* – Malayan eggfly - *[Hypolimnas bolina bolina](/wiki/Hypolimnas_bolina)* – great eggfly - *[Hypolimnas bolina jacintha](/wiki/Hypolimnas_bolina)* – Jacintha eggfly - *[Hypolimnas misippus misippus](/wiki/Hypolimnas_misippus)* – Danaid eggfly - *[Junonia almana javana](/wiki/Junonia_almana)* – peacock pansy - *[Junonia atlites atlites](/wiki/Junonia_atlites)* – grey pansy - *[Junonia hedonia ida](/wiki/Junonia_hedonia)* – chocolate pansy - *[Junonia orithya wallacei](/wiki/Junonia_orithya)* – blue pansy - *[Vanessa cardui](/wiki/Vanessa_cardui)* – painted lady - *[Vanessa indica indica](/wiki/Vanessa_indica)* – Indian red admiral ### Heliconiinae - *[Acraea violae](/wiki/Acraea_violae)* – tawny coster - *[Cethosia cyane](/wiki/Cethosia_cyane)* – leopard lacewing - *[Cethosia hypsea hypsina](/wiki/Cethosia_hypsea)* – Malay lacewing - *[Cethosia penthesilea methypsea](/wiki/Cethosia_penthesilea)* – plain lacewing - *[Cirrochroa orissa orissa](/wiki/Cirrochroa_orissa)* – banded yeoman - *[Cupha erymanthis lotis](/wiki/Cupha_erymanthis)* – rustic - *[Phalanta phalantha phalantha](/wiki/Phalanta_phalantha)* – leopard - *[Terinos terpander robertsia](/wiki/Terinos_terpander)* – royal Assyrian - *[Vindula dejone erotella](/wiki/Vindula_dejone)* – cruiser ### Limenitidinae - *[Athyma asura idita](/wiki/Athyma_asura)* – studded sergeant - *[Athyma kanwa kanwa](/wiki/Athyma_kanwa)* – dot-dash sergeant - *[Athyma nefte subrata](/wiki/Athyma_nefte)* – colour sergeant - *[Athyma pravara helma](/wiki/Athyma_pravara)* – lance sergeant - *[Athyma reta moorei](/wiki/Athyma_reta)* – Malay staff sergeant - *[Euthalia aconthea gurda](/wiki/Euthalia_aconthea)* – baron - *[Euthalia adonia pinwilli](/wiki/Euthalia_adonia)* – green baron - *[Euthalia merta merta](/wiki/Euthalia_merta)* – white tipped baron - *[Euthalia monina monina](/wiki/Euthalia_monina)* – Malay baron - *[Lasippa heliodore dorelia](/wiki/Lasippa_heliodore)* – Burmese lascar - *[Lasippa tiga siaka](/wiki/Lasippa_tiga)* – Malayan lascar - *[Lebadea martha parkeri](/wiki/Lebadea_martha)* – knight - *[Lexias canescens pardalina](/wiki/Lexias_canescens)* – yellow archduke - *[Lexias dirtea merguia](/wiki/Lexias_dirtea)* – black tipped archduke - *[Lexias pardalis dirteana](/wiki/Lexias_pardalis)* – archduke - *[Moduza procris milonia](/wiki/Moduza_procris)* – commander - *[Neptis harita harita](/wiki/Neptis_harita)* – chocolate sailor - *[Neptis hylas papaja](/wiki/Neptis_hylas)* – common sailor - *Neptis leucoporos cresina* – grey sailor - *Pandita sinope sinope* – colonel - *[Pantoporia hordonia hordonia](/wiki/Pantoporia_hordonia)* – common lascar - *[Pantoporia paraka paraka](/wiki/Pantoporia_paraka)* – Perak lascar - *[Phaedyma columella singa](/wiki/Phaedyma_columella)* – short banded sailor - *[Symbrenthia hippoclus](/wiki/Symbrenthia_hippoclus)* – common jester - *Tanaecia japis puseda* – Horsfield's baron - *[Tanaecia pelea pelea](/wiki/Tanaecia_pelea)* – Malay viscount ### Cyrestinae - *[Chersonesia peraka peraka](/wiki/Chersonesia_peraka)* – little maplet ### Apaturinae - *Eulaceura osteria kumana* – purple duke - *[Euripus nyctelius eupleoides](/wiki/Euripus_nyctelius)* – courtesan ### Charaxinae - *[Charaxes solon echo](/wiki/Charaxes_solon)* – black rajah - *[Polyura hebe plautus](/wiki/Polyura_hebe)* – plain nawab - *[Polyura schreiber tisamenus](/wiki/Polyura_schreiber)* – blue nawab ## Riodinidae ### Riodininae - *[Abisara geza niya](/wiki/Abisara_geza)* – spotted Judy - *[Abisara saturata kausamboides](/wiki/Abisara_saturata)* – Malayan plum Judy - *[Abisara savitri savitri](/wiki/Abisara_savitri)* – Malay tailed Judy - *[Laxita thuisto thuisto](/wiki/Laxita_thuisto)* – lesser harlequin - *[Taxila haquinus haquinus](/wiki/Taxila_haquinus)* – harlequin ## Lycaenidae ### Poritiinae - *[Poritia philota philota](/wiki/Poritia_philota)* – Malayan Gem - *[Poritia sumatrae sumatrae](/wiki/Poritia_sumatrae)* – Sumatran Gem ### Miletinae - *[Allotinus unicolor unicolor](/wiki/Allotinus_unicolor)* – lesser darkie - *[Liphyra brassolis abbreviata](/wiki/Liphyra_brassolis)* – moth butterfly - *[Logania marmorata damis](/wiki/Logania_marmorata)* – pale mottle - *[Miletus biggsii biggsii](/wiki/Miletus_biggsii)* – Bigg's brownie - *[Miletus gopara gopara](/wiki/Miletus_gopara)* - *[Miletus symethus petronius](/wiki/Miletus_symethus)* - *[Spalgis epius epius](/wiki/Spalgis_epius)* – apefly ### Curetinae - *[Curetis santana malayica](/wiki/Curetis_santana)* – [Malayan sunbeam](/wiki/Malayan_sunbeam) - *[Curetis saronis sumatrana](/wiki/Curetis_saronis)* – Sumatran sunbeam ### Aphnaeinae - *[Cigaritis lohita senama](/wiki/Cigaritis_lohita)* – long banded silverline - *[Cigaritis syama terana](/wiki/Cigaritis_syama)* – club silverline ### Theclinae - *[Ancema blanka blanka](/wiki/Ancema_blanka)* – silver royal - *[Arhopala abseus abseus](/wiki/Arhopala_abseus)* – aberrant oakblue - *[Arhopala aedias agnis](/wiki/Arhopala_aedias)* – large metallic oakblue - *[Arhopala ammon ammon](/wiki/Arhopala_ammon)* - *[Arhopala amphimuta amphimuta](/wiki/Arhopala_amphimuta)* - *[Arhopala antimuta antimuta](/wiki/Arhopala_antimuta)* - *[Arhopala athada athada](/wiki/Arhopala_athada)* – vinous oakblue - *[Arhopala atosia malayana](/wiki/Arhopala_atosia)* – tailed disc oakblue - *[Arhopala aurea](/wiki/Arhopala_aurea)* - *[Arhopala centaurus nakula](/wiki/Arhopala_centaurus)* – centaur oakblue - *[Arhopala epimuta epiala](/wiki/Arhopala_epimuta)* – common disc oakblue - *[Arhopala eumolphus maxwelli](/wiki/Arhopala_eumolphus)* – green oakblue - *[Arhopala major major](/wiki/Arhopala_major)* - *[Arhopala myrzala lammas](/wiki/Arhopala_myrzala)* - *[Arhopala pseudomuta pseudomuta](/wiki/Arhopala_pseudomuta)* – Raffles oakblue - *[Arhopala silhetensis adorea](/wiki/Arhopala_silhetensis)* – Sylhet oakblue - *[Arhopala trogon](/wiki/Arhopala_trogon)* - *[Bindahara phocides phocides](/wiki/Bindahara_phocides)* – plane - *[Catapaecilma major emas](/wiki/Catapaecilma_major)* – gray tinsel - *[Cheritra freja frigga](/wiki/Cheritra_freja)* – common imperial - *Deudorix elioti* – Eliot's cornelian - *[Deudorix epijarbas cinnabarus](/wiki/Deudorix_epijarbas)* – cornelian - *[Drupadia ravindra moorei](/wiki/Drupadia_ravindra)* – common posy - *[Drupadia rufotaenia rufotaenia](/wiki/Drupadia_rufotaenia)* – pygmy posy - *[Drupadia theda thesmia](/wiki/Drupadia_theda)* – dark posy - *[Eliotia jalindra burbona](/wiki/Eliotia_jalindra)* – banded royal - *[Eooxylides tharis distanti](/wiki/Eooxylides_tharis)* – branded imperial - *[Flos anniella anniella](/wiki/Flos_anniella)* – darky plushblue - *[Flos apidanus saturatus](/wiki/Flos_apidanus)* – plain plushblue - *[Flos diardi capeta](/wiki/Flos_diardi)* – bifid plushblue - *[Flos fulgida singhapura](/wiki/Flos_fulgida)* – shining plushblue - *[Horaga syrinx maenala](/wiki/Horaga_syrinx)* – Ambon onyx - *[Hypolycaena erylus teatus](/wiki/Hypolycaena_erylus)* – common tit - *[Hypolycaena thecloides thecloides](/wiki/Hypolycaena_thecloides)* – dark tit - *[Iraota distanti distanti](/wiki/Iraota_distanti)* – spotted silverstreak - *[Iraota rochana boswelliana](/wiki/Iraota_rochana)* – scarce silverstreak - *[Jacoona anasuja anasuja](/wiki/Jacoona_anasuja)* – great imperial - *[Pratapa deva relata](/wiki/Pratapa_deva)* – white royal - *[Pseudotajuria donatana donatana](/wiki/Pseudotajuria_donatana)* – golden royal - *[Rachana jalindra burbona](/wiki/Rachana_jalindra)* – banded royal - *[Rapala manea chozeba](/wiki/Rapala_manea)* – slate flash - *[Rapala pheretima sequiera](/wiki/Rapala_pheretima)* – copper flash - *[Rapala suffusa barthema](/wiki/Rapala_suffusa)* – suffused flash - *[Rapala varuna orseis](/wiki/Rapala_varuna)* – indigo flash - *[Remelana jangala travana](/wiki/Remelana_jangala)* – chocolate royal - *Semanga superba deliciosa* – red-edge - *[Sinthusa nasaka amba](/wiki/Sinthusa_nasaka)* – narrow spark - *[Surendra vivarna amisena](/wiki/Surendra_vivarna)* – acacia blue - *[Tajuria cippus maxentius](/wiki/Tajuria_cippus)* – peacock royal - *[Tajuria dominus dominus](/wiki/Tajuria_dominus)* - *[Tajuria mantra mantra](/wiki/Tajuria_mantra)* – Felder's royal - *[Virachola kessuma deliochus](/wiki/Virachola_kessuma)* – pitcher blue - *[Zeltus amasa maximinianus](/wiki/Zeltus_amasa)* – fluffy tit ### Polyommatinae - *[Acytolepis puspa lambi](/wiki/Acytolepis_puspa)* – common hedge blue - *[Anthene emolus goberus](/wiki/Anthene_emolus)* – ciliate blue - *[Anthene lycaenina miya](/wiki/Anthene_lycaenina)* – pointed ciliate blue - *[Caleta elna elvira](/wiki/Caleta_elna)* – elbowed Pierrot - *[Megisba malaya sikkima](/wiki/Megisba_malaya)* – Malayan - *[Nacaduba angusta kerriana](/wiki/Nacaduba_angusta)* – white four-line blue - *[Nacaduba berenice icena](/wiki/Nacaduba_berenice)* – rounded six line blue - *[Neopithecops zalmora zalmora](/wiki/Neopithecops_zalmora)* – Quaker - *[Petrelaea dana dana](/wiki/Petrelaea_dana)* – dingy line blue - *[Prosotas dubiosa lumpura](/wiki/Prosotas_dubiosa)* – tailess line blue - *[Prosotas lutea sivoka](/wiki/Prosotas_lutea)* – banded lineblue - *[Prosotas nora superdates](/wiki/Prosotas_nora)* – common line-blue - *[Zizeeria maha serica](/wiki/Zizeeria_maha)* – pale grass blue - *[Zizina otis lampa](/wiki/Zizina_otis)* – lesser grass blue - *[Zizula hylax pygmaea](/wiki/Zizula_hylax)* – pygmy grass blue ## Hesperiidae ### Coeliadinae - *[Badamia exclamationis](/wiki/Badamia_exclamationis)* – brown awl - *[Bibasis sena uniformis](/wiki/Bibasis_sena)* – orange tailed awl - *[Burara etelka](/wiki/Burara_etelka)* – great orange awlet - *[Burara harisa consobrina](/wiki/Burara_harisa)* – orange awlet - *[Hasora badra badra](/wiki/Hasora_badra)* – common awl - *[Hasora vitta vitta](/wiki/Hasora_vitta)* – plain banded awl ### Pyrginae - *[Celaenorrhinus asmara asmara](/wiki/Celaenorrhinus_asmara)* – white banded flat - *Gerosis limax dirae* – black and white flat - *[Gerosis sinica minima](/wiki/Gerosis_sinica)* - *[Mooreana trichoneura trichoneura](/wiki/Mooreana_trichoneura)* – yellow flat - *Odina hieroglyphica ortina* – hieroglyphic flat - *[Odontoptilum angulatum angulatum](/wiki/Odontoptilum_angulatum)* – chestnut angle - *Potanthus trachala tytleri* – detached dart - *Pyroneura latoia latoia* – yellow vein lancer - *Quedara monteithi monteithi* - *Salanoemia tavoyana* – yellow streak darter - *Suastus everyx everyx* – white palm bob - *[Suastus gremius gremius](/wiki/Suastus_gremius)* – palm bob - *[Taractrocera archias quinta](/wiki/Taractrocera_archias)* – yellow grass dart - *[Taractrocera ardonia lamia](/wiki/Taractrocera_ardonia)* - *[Telicota augias augias](/wiki/Telicota_augias)* – palm dart - *Telicota besta bina* – Besta palm dart - *[Telicota colon stinga](/wiki/Telicota_colon)* – common palm dart - *[Udaspes folus](/wiki/Udaspes_folus)* – grass demon - *Unkana ambasa batara* – hoary palmer - *Zela storeyi* - *Zographetus doxus* – spotted flitter - [Wildlife of Singapore](/wiki/Wildlife_of_Singapore) - Fleming, W.
